text.text_translated:
"The Hunger Games" is an event. It happens every year.
The Capitol uses this event to punish the areas. It wants them to remember their fight against the Capitol.
Every year, people choose one boy and one girl. They are 12 to 18 years old.
They choose them from each area by chance.
These chosen young people are called 'tributes'. They must fight in the games.
Only one person can stay alive.
The Capitol makes all the people in the country watch this event on TV.

The Capitol uses this event to show the areas their punishment.

Every year, people choose one boy and one girl. They are 12 to 18 years old.
They choose them from each area by chance.
These young people are called 'tributes'.
These tributes must fight. Only one person can stay alive.
The Capitol makes all the people in the country watch this event on TV.
